segments.text: I see the boy climbing on the stool, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is unstable, and it looks like he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's being very brave, trying to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl standing nearby, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman is still drying dishes, completely unaware of what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to be successful in getting the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water overflowing from the sink, creating a puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the woman's foot is already in the water, but she doesn't seem to realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being very clever, trying to get the cookies without the woman noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy's hand reaching into the cookie jar, trying to grab a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think he's going to be successful and share the cookies with the girl.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the girl's arm raised, palm open, waiting for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, working together to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
